text.en: Discard 1 Level 4 Insect or Plant monster, or 1 Normal Trap; draw 2 cards. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 of your banished Level 4 Insect or Plant monsters, or 1 of your banished Normal Traps; place it on the bottom of the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Traptrix Allure" once per turn.

ja.set_name: Structure Deck: Forest of the Traptrix
